title: 22. What's Coming in 2020: Supercharged SPF, Microbiome Friendly Treatments, Blue Beauty + More Trends!
description:
Hi beauties! In this episode we are talking all that's new + trending in 2020 skincare! From bluelight sunscreen to an emphasis on sustainability, get excited for the newest innovations coming in 2020!

 Xo, Tess & Lo

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
